title: Practical Competency Enhancement Through Logistics Management Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Logistics Terminology and Understanding of Business Processes
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based mobile simulation tools, combining offline workshops with online learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more supply chain optimization strategies through logistics network design simulations.
Learners execute decision-making processes to achieve a 15% improvement in inventory turnover rate in inventory management simulations.
Learners identify five types of global logistics risks and propose mitigation strategies through transportation/customs clearance simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
